ゲートを通った俺たちは、\nついにメイズ内へと降り立った。:
We passed through the gate...
At last, we descended into the Maze.
ようこそ、メイズへ！\nここは<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>。いわゆる、一:
Welcome to Mays!
This is the <r-cave belt> Earthhole belt. It's the shallowest floor, so to speak!
なんかさっきから、テンション高くないか？: Haven't you been in high spirits for a while now?
おまえが言う？\n訓練の時の変な軍曹キャラより全然マシ。:
You're the one saying that?
It's way better than that weird sergeant character from training.
ちゆるさんは、メイズ研究同好会を主宰していますからね。: Chiyuru-san presides over the Mayse Research Society, after all.
つまりメイズ大好きさんというわけですわ。そのぶん、知識も豊富。: In other words, she loves Mayse. She has a lot of knowledge.
でも会員は確かひとりなんだっけ？: But there's only one member, right?
しかも詳細の活動内容は不明で、ちょっと怪しいですけれど。: We don't know the details of their activities, so it's a little suspicious.
……つまりひとりでメイズに興奮してる、危ないヤツってことか。: ...In other words, she's a dangerous person who's excited about Maze all by herself.
どうして！ 知識欲がバシバシ刺激されるでしょ！？\nしかもタツミヤ鉱以外に、人間:
Why?! Isn't my thirst for knowledge getting slapped?!
And besides Tatsumiya Ore, we can even mine humans!
俺を鉱石と一緒にするな！\n相当特殊なケースだろ！:
Don't lump me in with the ore!
It's a very special case!
ま、この階層はとっくに掘りつくされてるから、\n採掘の期待値は高くないけどね。:
Well, this floor has already been dug up, so...
The expected value of the mines isn't high, though.
ちなみに、私たちの侵入許可は、\n<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>までしか下:
By the way, our permission to infiltrate
<r-cave belt>It's only gone down to the underground zone <r>.
ゆえに、成果を得るならば、出現するメイズシフターが\nタツミヤ鉱を貯め込んでいる:
Therefore, if we want to achieve results, we need the maise shifter to appear.
Tatsumiya ore can be stored up, so that's what we're after.
ああ、そのあたりは補修で教え込まれたよ。\nそれに今回は、深入りするつもりもなか:
Yeah, I was taught that through repairs.
Besides, I didn't intend to get too involved this time.
お？ あんだけメイズに行きたがってたのに？\nビビっちゃった？:
Oh? Even though you wanted to go to Mayse so badly?
Did you freak out?
あの時は、俺も戦闘できるって思ってたんだよ！\n丸腰だから諦めたの！:
At the time, I thought I could fight, too!
I gave up because I was unarmed!
ひとまず今日の目標は、片っ端からメイズシフターを倒しまくる。\nそれだけだ。:
For the time being, our goal for today was to defeat the Mayse-Sifter one by one.
That's all.
俺は指揮を取らない。七彩もリーダーシップは封印だ。\nとにかく各自の自己判断に任:
I won't take command. Shichika's leadership is a seal.
In any case, I'll leave it up to each of you to make your own decisions.
は……はぁ！？ なんですのそれは！\n組織的戦闘をするなというのですか！？:
Wh-What?! What's that supposed to mean?!
Are you telling me not to engage in organized combat?!
おっ、よくわかってるじゃないか。\nちなみに採掘報酬は、メイズシフター撃破数に応:
Oh, you really do get it.
By the way, the mining reward will be distributed according to the number of Mayscissors defeated.
ななな……！ それじゃ、協力ではなく競争をしろと？\n同じチームで！？:
Wh-Wh-What...?! So you're telling me to compete, not cooperate?
In the same team?!
……質問。ふたりで一体を仕留めた場合は？: ...Question. What if we kill one of them together?
トドメを入れた方の撃破数に加算する。\n個人戦績だけを有効とみなすぞ。:
I add it to the number of blows I dealt the finishing blow to.
I'll consider your personal battle record to be the only effective one.
アシストは無駄骨ってことかい？\nそれはさすがに……:
You mean the assist is a waste of time?
That's a bit...
ラミたちで喧嘩してもしょーがないじゃん！\nやっぱ指揮官向いてないんじゃない？:
There's no point in fighting with Rami and the others!
I guess you're not cut out to be a commander after all.
どうしてそうあなたは、チームワークを否定することばかり……: Why do you always deny teamwork...?
わ……わかりましたっ！\nとにかくいっぱいいっぱい、倒せばいいんですよね！:
O-Okay!
Anyway, we just have to defeat a lot of them, right?!
めるさん！？\nあなた、まさか従うつもりですの！？:
Meru-san?!
Don't tell me you're going to obey!?
もちろんです！ だって%usernameusernameuserna%さんの指示:
Of course! After all, %usernameusernameuserna%-san's instructions...
I'm sure it means something!!
める、目がキマってるし。コワ～。\nフラットスピンしすぎでおかしくなっちゃった。:
M-My eyes are sharp. Scary~.
I've been spinning too much, and I'm losing my mind.
そう……私にはフラットスピンがあります！\n%usernameusernameu:
That's right... I have a flat spin!
With this technique that %usernameusernameuserna% taught me directly...!
いきます！ エンゲージ・オフェンシヴ！\nキーーーーンッ！！:
Here we go! Engaging Offense!
Keeeeeeeen!!
と、めるはレーダーに映ったメイズシフターの群れへ向かっていく。\nだが、考え無し:
With that, Meguru heads for the group of Mayscifers on her radar.
But it didn't seem like she'd charged in without thinking.
フラットスピンを使った高速機動で群れに対して\n有利な位置を陣取り、地の利をうま:
It was a high-speed maneuver using flatspins against the swarm
They're positioned in an advantageous position, making good use of their geographical advantage to fight.
めるにフラットスピンを仕込んだのは正解だったな。: I guess I was right to put a flat spin on it.
くっ……めるさんにだけ戦わせるわけには……！\nみなさん続いて！ 援護しますわよ:
Ugh... I can't let Meru-san fight alone...!
Follow me, everyone! I'll cover you!
援護じゃないぞー。ここからは点の取り合いをしろ！: I'm not here to back you up. From here on out, fight for points!
ああもうっ……！\nわかりましたわよ！:
Aaah, geez...!
All right, all right!
出遅れた４人も、メイズシフターへと突っ込んでいく。: The four of them, who had been too late, also charged at the maise shifter.
そこからの戦いは、互いに撃墜数を競い合い、\nチームとしての連携もクソもない戦い:
The battle from there was a competition to see how many they could shoot down each other
It goes without saying that it was a battle without any coordination or shit as a team...
楽しかったけど、疲れたぁ～。全然上手くいかなかったしね……: It was fun, but I'm tired. It didn't go well at all...
そりゃあんだけ派手に衝突してりゃね。ラミもまだお尻痛いし。: That's because of that flashy clash. Rami's butt still hurts.
訓練で学んだことを活かすとか、そういう次元ではなかったですわね……: It wasn't on the level of making use of what I learned during training...
でもわたし、今回は壁とかみなさんに機体をぶつけずに済みました！: But this time, I didn't bump into the wall or anyone else!
危ないと思ったら、すっごい軌道で遠くにすっ飛んでいくんだもん。\n何アレ？:
If you think it's dangerous, it'll fly off into the distance in an amazing orbit.
What's that?
フラットスピン……あんな動きができるんだ。: Flat spin... I didn't know she could move like that.
確かに感心しましたけれど……こんな戦い方、身も心も持ちませんわ。: I'm certainly impressed, but... I don't have a body or soul to fight like this.
いやいやホントに。いつもの数倍疲れたよ～。: No, no, seriously. I'm several times more tired than usual.
待たせたな。今デバイスに結果が届いた。\nそれぞれのタツミヤ鉱の採掘量が算出され:
Sorry to keep you waiting. I just got the results on the device.
The amount of Tatsumiya Ore mined has been calculated.
どーでもいーわー。全然倒せなかったしー。: It doesn't matter. I couldn't beat him at all.
撃破数１位は――める、お前ぶっちぎりだ。よくやったな！: First place is――Sh-Sheesh, you're a real piece of work. Good job!
あ、ありがとうございます！\nえへへ、%usernameusernameuser:
Th-Thank you very much!
Ehehe, thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%...
報酬分配はこのくらいだ。今デバイスで送金する。\n好きに使っていいぞ。:
This is the extent of the reward distribution. I'll send you a transfer via the device now.
Feel free to use it however you like.
ありが……ええええっ！！？\nけけ、桁が間違っていませんかあ！？:
Thank you... Whaaaaat?!!
A-Aren't you on the wrong track?!
いいや？ 今日の成果はほとんどめるだったからな。\n撃破数に応じた分配だって言っ:
No? Today's results were pretty much nil.
Didn't I tell you that it was distributed according to the number of defeats?
ねえ、ラミは！？ ラミはいくらだったの！？: Hey, what about Rami?! How much did Rami cost?!
待って、今送金する。……こんなもんだ。: Wait, I'll send the money now. ...This is it.
は……なにこれ！\n子どものお小遣いかっつーの！！:
Hah... What's this?!
It's a child's allowance!!
悔しかったらもっと掘って、もっとメイズシフターを倒せ。\n明日以降も、同じ方式で:
If you're frustrated, dig more and take down more maise shifters.
We're going to dive into the Maze in the same way from tomorrow on.
これは……ちょっと本腰いれないといけないようだね。: Looks like I'll have to get serious.
